videos.title: مقدمة عن دورة اسس الشبكات  | Network Fundamentals
videos.description:
اعلان:
افضل جامعة اوربية لتقديم الدراسات البكالوريوس والماجستير عن بعد
سجل الان واحصل على منحة تصل الى 67%
سجل من خلال الرابط التالي:
https://bit.ly/49AITNp 

............................ كورس يستعرض لك اساسيات الشبكات.
محتويات الكورس:
Module 1: Introduction to Networking
1.1 What is Networking?
1.1.1 Definitions and basic concepts
1.1.2 Importance of networking in modern life

1.2 Types of Networks
1.2.1 Local Area Network (LAN)
1.2.2 Wide Area Network (WAN)
1.2.3 Wireless Networks (Wi-Fi)
1.2.4 Cloud-based Networks

Module 2: Network Components and Communication
2.1 Network Devices
2.1.1 Network Interface Cards (NICs)
2.1.2 Switches and Hubs
2.1.3 Routers and Gateways
2.1.4 Modems and Bridges

2.2 Network Communication Protocols
2.2.1 Overview of TCP/IP protocol suite
2.2.2 Ethernet: Frames and MAC addresses
2.2.3 IP Addressing and Subnetting Basics

Module 3: Local Network Setup in Windows
3.1 Network Configuration in Windows
3.1.1 Understanding IP addresses, subnet masks, and default gateways
3.1.2 Configuring network settings in Windows

3.2 Setting Up a Local Area Network (LAN)
3.2.1 Choosing wired or wireless LAN setup
3.2.2 Connecting computers and devices in Windows

3.3 File and Printer Sharing
3.3.1 Enabling file sharing between Windows devices
3.3.2 Sharing printers on the local network

Module 4: Network Security and Management
4.1 Network Security Fundamentals
4.1.1 Common network security threats
4.1.2 Firewalls and Access Control Lists (ACLs)

4.2 Wireless Network Security
4.2.1 Securing Wi-Fi networks (WPA2, WPA3)
4.2.2 Guest networks and network segmentation

4.3 Network Troubleshooting and Monitoring
4.3.1 Troubleshooting common network issues in Windows
4.3.2 Using network monitoring tools in Windows
.................................
تابع الدورة : 
https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLhiFu-f80eo_xmPj5LQ4WCJ7iCVjFjSZQ

كلمات مفتاحية للدورة:
#TCP/IPProtocolSuite
#TCP/IPOverview
#EthernetFrames
#MACAddresses
#IPAddressing
#IPv4vsIPv6
#SubnettingBasics
#CIDRNotation
#NetworkingProtocols
#InternetProtocol
#DataTransmission
#NetworkCommunication
#NetworkBasics
#LANandWAN
#NetworkRouting
#TCPvsUDP
#InternetTechnology
#IPRouting
#NetworkingFundamentals
#EthernetTechnology
..................................

تصفح متجر القناة : https://tecnou.store/
لا تنسى الاشتراك في القناة :)
للتواصل:
انستكرام - https://www.instagram.com/safaa_j.k/
GitHub : https://github.com/engsafaaj
Android Apps : https://play.google.com/store/apps/developer?id=Safaa+Jassim
المؤلفات والكتب : https://www.noor-book.com/u/Safaa-Jassim/books
دورات مميزة على يوديمي: https://www.udemy.com/user/safaa-jassim/

****************
 نحن نؤمن بأن يكون المحتوى التعليمي مجاني بالكامل وللجميع ولكن يمكنك ان تكون اقرب الينا و تقدم دعمك لنا على منصة باتريون :)
https://www.patreon.com/tecnou

videos.title: 07. الاجهزة في الشبكة | Network Fundamentals
videos.description:
اعلان:
افضل جامعة اوربية لتقديم الدراسات البكالوريوس والماجستير عن بعد
سجل الان واحصل على منحة تصل الى 67%

https://bit.ly/49AITNp 

............................ كورس يستعرض لك اساسيات الشبكات.
محتويات الكورس:
Module 1: Introduction to Networking
1.1 What is Networking?
1.1.1 Definitions and basic concepts
1.1.2 Importance of networking in modern life

1.2 Types of Networks
1.2.1 Local Area Network (LAN)
1.2.2 Wide Area Network (WAN)
1.2.3 Wireless Networks (Wi-Fi)
1.2.4 Cloud-based Networks

Module 2: Network Components and Communication
2.1 Network Devices
2.1.1 Network Interface Cards (NICs)
2.1.2 Switches and Hubs
2.1.3 Routers and Gateways
2.1.4 Modems and Bridges

2.2 Network Communication Protocols
2.2.1 Overview of TCP/IP protocol suite
2.2.2 Ethernet: Frames and MAC addresses
2.2.3 IP Addressing and Subnetting Basics

Module 3: Local Network Setup in Windows
3.1 Network Configuration in Windows
3.1.1 Understanding IP addresses, subnet masks, and default gateways
3.1.2 Configuring network settings in Windows

3.2 Setting Up a Local Area Network (LAN)
3.2.1 Choosing wired or wireless LAN setup
3.2.2 Connecting computers and devices in Windows

3.3 File and Printer Sharing
3.3.1 Enabling file sharing between Windows devices
3.3.2 Sharing printers on the local network

Module 4: Network Security and Management
4.1 Network Security Fundamentals
4.1.1 Common network security threats
4.1.2 Firewalls and Access Control Lists (ACLs)

4.2 Wireless Network Security
4.2.1 Securing Wi-Fi networks (WPA2, WPA3)
4.2.2 Guest networks and network segmentation

4.3 Network Troubleshooting and Monitoring
4.3.1 Troubleshooting common network issues in Windows
4.3.2 Using network monitoring tools in Windows
.................................
تابع الدورة : 
https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLhiFu-f80eo_xmPj5LQ4WCJ7iCVjFjSZQ
